sub_title: Operations and Logistic Manager in MEK Europe / Walking Talking English School Founder and Owner
summary:
Professional with 8 years experience in Logistics and Administration, 9 years in Hotel Management and 18 years in Teaching and Education. Highly-skilled and educated candidate with a wide range of knowledge in logistics operation, systems and administration, educational platforms, new methods of teaching and hotel management. Dedicated natural leader with hands on approach. Acquired a high self-esteem in making accurate decisions and taking actions when proceeding with daily smooth operation. 
Skilled Coordinator managing retail and product returns for local retailers. Track record of completing tasks with efficiency and thoroughness. Focused on supporting business productivity goals and ensuring high-quality customer service.
